text: NARRATOR: When the world needs saving, it will take the most elite team on earth: Skipper, Kowalski, Rico, and Private.
SKIPPER: We're the elitest of the elite. Up high!
NARRATOR: From the creators of Madagascar...
SKIPPER: Okay boys, this is it. The mission we have been preparing for our entire lives.
CLASSIFIED: Remain calm, penguins. You are now under the protection of the North Wind.
SKIPPER: We're not going anywhere with you. We don't even know who the heck you are.
CLASSIFIED: The North Wind is an elite undercover interspe—     SKIPPER: [Crunches loudly]

CLASSIFIED: An elite undercover interspecies—
SKIPPER: [Crunches loudly]

CLASSIFIED: [Quickly] --dedicated to helping animals who can't—
SKIPPER: [Crunches loudly]
KOWALSKI: Skipper, we've got to be five miles up. That pretty much limits our options.
SKIPPER: I make my own options.
KOWALSKI: Brilliant move, Skipper. But now we seem to be outside the plane.
SKIPPER: I kinda got caught up in the moment. Well, hindsight's 20/20.
PRIVATE: Oh, why don't we catch that plane?
SKIPPER: Now we're talkin'. Lets get to work.
SKIPPER: Okay then, it's clear what we need to do next.
KOWALSKI: Yeah, baby, that feels right.
